A post-apocalyptic world where the ocean has dried up, and humanity must adapt to survive in the harsh new environment.
A story of a group of scientists who discover a way to bring the ocean back to life, but at a great cost.
A tale of a young girl who lives in a small village near the coast where the ocean has dried up, and she must navigate the challenges of her daily life in the face of this natural disaster.
A science fiction story where the ocean has dried up, and humanity must explore new frontiers in search of a new source of water.
A historical fiction story that explores the impact of the ocean drying up on ancient civilizations that relied heavily on the sea for their survival.
